title: State agencies or departments: public communications.
subject: Stateagenciesordepartments
publiccommunications

abstracts.abstract:
Existing law requires a state agency or department that utilizes generative artificial intelligence (GenAI) to directly communicate with a person regarding government services and benefits to ensure that those communications include a disclaimer that indicates to the person that the communication was generated by GenAI, as specified, and information describing how a person may contact a human employee of the state agency or department.

This bill would instead require that disclaimer when a state agency or department communicates with the public.

extras.impact_clause: An act to amend Section 11549.66 of the Government Code, relating to artificial intelligence.
